title: Integrating Gender Equality in Translation Education: Applying Formative Research-Based Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental translation skills and comprehension of gender equality concepts
context.additional_context: Learners primarily access content via smartphones, with dual goals of gaining practical translation experience and enhancing gender equality awareness.

learning_goals: One can critically analyze English-Korean translation texts from a gender-sensitive perspective.
One can produce practical translations by applying at least three strategies that reflect gender equality principles.
Based on formative research, one can identify cases of gender bias in the translation process and propose improvement measures.

resources: Gender Equality-Related Translation Sample Text Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
